div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 195 Abae, Phocis, 1894 (1) Burial: c. 225-200 B.C. ? (T) Contents: 63 AR, 2 AE. From excavations Alexander III: 4 dr. Philip III: 1 dr. Aenianes: 1 triob. Aetolian League: 1 AE Locri Opuntii: 1 st.; 2 triob. Phocis: 3 triob. Boeotia: 1 dr.; 7 triob.; 1 AE Chalcis: 8 dr. Aegina: 1 st.; 1 dr. Achaean League: 1 triob. (early) Sicyon: 1 dr.; 26 triob. Elis: 2 st. Argos: 1 dr. Arcadian League: 2 triob. Disposition: Athens JHS 1896, p. 302 This classification, differing slightly from that of Noe, results from a reexamina- tion of the hd. and from Svoronos' papers
